item.title: OpenAI 或正测试新产品、首款设备计划今年下半年亮相
item.guid: OpenAI-或正测试新产品、首款设备计划今年下半年亮相
item.description:
According to BleepingComputer, OpenAI was recently found to have enabled a new subdomain with "sonata" as the domain prefix, leading to speculation that this may correspond to a new ChatGPT feature or product currently under testing. 据 BleepingComputer 报道，OpenAI 近日被发现启用了以「sonata」为域名前缀的新子域名，外界推测这可能对应一项正在测试中的 ChatGPT 新功能或新产品。

Relevant records show that sonata.openai.com first appeared on January 16, and sonata.api.openai.com was discovered on January 15, meaning OpenAI has simultaneously enabled this prefix in both its main site and API system, typically indicating new services under internal testing or web tools for users. 相关记录显示，sonata.openai.com 于 1 月 16 日首次出现，sonata.api.openai.com 则在 1 月 15 日被发现，意味着 OpenAI 已在主站与 API 体系中同步启用该前缀，通常指向内部测试中的新服务或面向用户的网页工具。

The report points out that newly added OpenAI domains often correspond to unreleased product pages, internal tools, or web applications. Although the word "sonata" itself is often used to refer to multi-movement instrumental works, its meaning is not limited to the music field, so it is currently impossible to determine the functional direction based on this. 报道指出，OpenAI 新增域名往往对应尚未公开的产品页面、内部工具或 Web 应用。尽管「sonata」一词本身常用于指代多乐章器乐作品，但其含义并不限定于音乐领域，因此目前尚无法据此判断功能方向。

In addition to the new domain, OpenAI has also been continuously updating ChatGPT's existing capabilities, including the "quote chat history" feature. When enabled by users, ChatGPT will be more reliable in retrieving old conversation details and will mark the source of quotes in its answers, making it easier for users to trace back the context. 除新域名外，OpenAI 近期也在持续更新 ChatGPT 的现有能力，包括「引用聊天记录」功能，当用户开启后，ChatGPT 在检索旧对话细节时将更为可靠，并会在回答中标注引用来源，便于用户回溯上下文。

Furthermore, according to Axios, Chris Lehane, OpenAI's head of global affairs, stated today at the Axios House event in Davos that OpenAI is proceeding as planned with its first hardware device, aiming for a debut in the second half of this year. 此外，据 Axios 报道，OpenAI 全球事务负责人 Chris Lehane 今天在达沃斯的 Axios House 活动上表示，OpenAI 正按计划推进其首款硬件设备，目标是在今年下半年亮相。

This marks the first time OpenAI has provided a clearer timeline since acquiring the company founded by former Apple design chief Jony Ive last year. 这也是继去年收购前苹果设计主管 Jony Ive 创办的公司后，OpenAI 首次给出更明确的时间窗口。

Lehane listed "devices" as one of OpenAI's key focuses this year, but did not reveal any appearance, form, or interaction methods. Previous reports mentioned that OpenAI is testing small, screenless prototypes that may interact with users in a wearable manner. Lehane 将「设备」列为 OpenAI 今年的重点方向之一，但并未透露任何外观、形态或交互方式。此前多份报道提到，OpenAI 正在测试无屏幕的小型原型机，可能以可穿戴方式与用户互动。

Sam Altman previously stated that this device would be more "peaceful" than a smartphone, with a minimalist design at its core. Sam Altman 曾表示，这款设备将比智能手机更「平和」，并以极简设计为核心。

The promotional video released by the Ive team when it was acquired last year also hinted at a 2026 release, stating, "We look forward to sharing our work with you next year." Ive 团队在去年被收购时发布的宣传视频中也曾暗示 2026 年的发布节点，称「我们期待明年与大家分享我们的工作」。

Lehane added at the event that OpenAI is "considering launching something later this year," but still reserves room for adjustment, emphasizing that the final timing depends on R&D progress. He did not promise that the device would officially go on sale this year. Lehane 在活动中补充称，OpenAI 正「考虑在今年后段推出某些东西」，但仍保留调整空间，强调最终时间取决于研发进展。他并未承诺设备会在今年正式开售。

item.title: 保时捷中国总裁回应销量下滑：2025 确实是充满挑战的一年
item.guid: 保时捷中国总裁回应销量下滑：2025-确实是充满挑战的一年
item.description:
According to China Newsweek, Alexander Pollich, President of Porsche China, responded to last year's sales decline in China and this year's market outlook during an exclusive interview. He emphasized that the sales pullback was a strategic adjustment within expectations, not an deterioration of the brand's fundamentals. 据中新经纬报道 ，保时捷中国总裁潘励驰（Alexander Pollich）在接受专访时，就去年在华销量下滑及今年市场展望作出回应。他强调，销量回调属于预期之内的战略性调整，并非品牌基本面恶化。

Data released by Porsche shows: 保时捷公布的数据显示：

    Its global sales last year were 279,400 units, a year-on-year decrease of 10%;

    Sales in the Chinese market were 41,900 units, a year-on-year decrease of 26.28%;

    As of the end of last year, Porsche's sales in China had declined for four consecutive years, with 93,300 units, 79,300 units, and 56,900 units from 2022 to 2024 respectively, with the decline widening year by year.

Pollich stated that last year was "a challenging year" for the luxury car market , with the rapid rise of local new energy brands bringing structural pressure, and all traditional luxury brands facing similar situations. 潘励驰表示，去年对豪华车市场而言是「充满挑战的一年」 ，本土新能源品牌的快速崛起带来结构性压力，所有传统豪华品牌均面临类似局面。

He emphasized that Porsche adheres to the core strategy of "quality over quantity," maintaining a healthy supply-demand relationship and value system through proactive business adjustments. 他强调，保时捷坚持「质大于量」的核心战略，通过主动业务调整维持健康的供需关系与价值体系。

He pointed out that Porsche China's exclusive models for China, such as the Cayenne, Macan GTS and Dream Edition, and Panamera Timeless Edition, have received positive feedback, indicating that the strategic adjustments are beginning to show results. 他指出，保时捷中国推出的 Cayenne、Macan 劲驰版与逐梦版，以及 Panamera 隽永版等中国专属车型已获得积极反馈，显示战略调整初见成效。

Looking ahead to this year, Pollich believes that the luxury car market will remain under pressure, especially as the first full year of implementation after the adjustment of the luxury car consumption tax policy, the impact will be fully evident, thus making it impossible to provide a clear sales forecast . 展望今年，潘励驰认为豪华车市场仍将承压，尤其是豪华车消费税政策调整后的首个完整实施年度，影响将全面显现， 因此无法给出明确销量预测 。

He also emphasized his confidence in the long-term prospects of the Chinese market, believing that the demand for high-quality, personalized, and emotionally valuable luxury products remains stable. 他同时强调对中国市场长期前景保持信心，认为高品质、个性化、富有情感价值的豪华产品需求依然稳固。

In terms of channel layout, Porsche plans to adjust its sales outlets from 120 at the end of last year to approximately 80 by the end of this year. 在渠道布局方面，保时捷计划将销售网点从去年底的 120 家调整至今年底的约 80 家。

Pollich explained that this plan is based on regional heatmaps, customer distribution, and outlet operational quality assessments, aiming to achieve "more efficient" network coverage. He pointed out that as the proportion of online leads increases, offline stores are transforming towards in-depth experience, negotiation, and delivery, and a more streamlined network can still support considerable sales. 潘励驰解释称，这一规划基于区域热点图、客户分布及网点运营质量评估，旨在实现「更高效」的网络覆盖。他指出，随着线上线索占比提升，线下门店正向深度体验、洽谈和交付转型，更精炼的网络仍能支撑可观销量。

To address dealer profitability pressure, Porsche China will reduce costs and improve channel health through wholesale financing, optional configuration support, online training, and other methods. He emphasized that the brand pursues "value-oriented sales" rather than mere sales growth. 针对经销商盈利压力，保时捷中国将通过批售融资、选装配置支持、线上培训等方式降低成本、提升渠道健康度。他强调，品牌追求的是「价值导向的销售」，而非单纯的销量增长。

Finally, Pollich stated that Porsche will continue to advance its "Win Back China" strategy by strengthening brand power, enhancing customer loyalty, and increasing investment in local R&D and brand experience to consolidate its long-term competitiveness in the world's largest automotive market. 最后，潘励驰表示，保时捷将继续推进「赢回中国」战略，通过强化品牌力、提升客户忠诚度、加大本土研发与品牌体验投入，巩固在全球最大汽车市场的长期竞争力。

item.title: Threads 移动端日活达 1.4 亿 正式反超 X
item.guid: Threads-移动端日活达-1.4-亿-正式反超-X
item.description:
According to TechCrunch, the latest data from market intelligence firm Similarweb shows that Meta's Threads has surpassed Elon Musk's X in daily active users (DAU) on mobile devices. 据 TechCrunch 报道，市场情报公司 Similarweb 的最新数据显示，Meta 旗下的 Threads 在移动设备上的日活跃用户数（DAU）已超过马斯克的 X。

As of January 7, Threads had 141.5 million daily active users on iOS and Android, while X had 125 million daily active users on mobile devices. This data indicates that after several months of growth, Threads has established an advantage on mobile. 截至 1 月 7 日，Threads 在 iOS 和 Android 端的日活跃用户达到 1.415 亿，而 X 在移动设备上的日活跃用户为 1.25 亿。这一数据表明，经过数月的增长，Threads 已在移动端确立了优势。

However, X still dominates on the web. Similarweb data shows that X's daily web visits remain around 150 million, while Threads' web platforms (including Threads.com and Threads.net) only have 8.5 million daily visits. 不过，X 在网页端仍占据主导地位。Similarweb 数据显示，X 的每日网页访问量保持在 1.5 亿左右，而 Threads 的网页端（包含 Threads.com 和 Threads.net）日访问量仅为 850 万。

The report points out that Threads' growth is not solely due to X's recent controversies, but rather the result of a long-term trend. Over the past year, Threads has successively launched features such as "interest communities," "better filters," direct messages (DMs), long-form posts, and "view once" content, and was even recently discovered to be testing gaming features. 报道指出，Threads 的增长并非单纯源于 X 近期的争议，而是长期趋势的结果。在过去一年中，Threads 陆续推出了「兴趣社区」、「更好的过滤器」、私信（DMs）、长文发布以及「阅后即焚」等功能，近期甚至被发现正在测试游戏功能。

Looking back at last year's data, Meta announced in August last year that Threads' monthly active users exceeded 400 million, and then stated in October last year that its daily active users reached 150 million. 回顾去年数据，Meta 曾在去年 8 月宣布 Threads 月活跃用户突破 4 亿，随后在去年 10 月称其日活跃用户达到 1.5 亿。

It is worth noting that while Threads' mobile performance is strong globally, X still maintains a lead in the US domestic market, though the gap between them is significantly narrowing. A year ago, X's daily active users in the US were double that of Threads; now, this advantage is no longer obvious. 值得注意的是，尽管在全球范围内 Threads 移动端表现强劲，但 X 在美国本土市场依然保持领先，不过双方的差距正在显著缩小。一年前，X 在美国的日活跃用户数是 Threads 的两倍，如今这一优势已不再明显。

item.title: 《2025 胡润中国人工智能 50 强》发布，寒武纪登顶 6300 亿元
item.guid: 《2025-胡润中国人工智能-50-强》发布，寒武纪登顶-6300-亿元
item.description:
Yesterday, the Hurun Research Institute released the "2025 Hurun China AI Companies Top 50," ranking companies by enterprise value, focusing on those whose main business is AI computing power or algorithms. Overall, AI chip-related companies continue to dominate, with 7 of the top ten coming from the computing hardware sector. 昨天，胡润研究院发布《2025 胡润中国人工智能企业 50 强》，榜单按照企业价值进行排名，聚焦主营业务为 AI 算力或算法的企业。整体来看，AI 芯片相关企业继续占据主导位置，前十名中有 7 家来自算力硬件领域。

    AI chip company Cambricon topped the list with a value of 630 billion yuan, a 165% increase from last year; in the first half of this year, it achieved revenue of 2.88 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 43 times, and participated in the formulation of 45 domestic and international technical standards.

    Domestic GPU company Moore Threads ranked second with a value of 310 billion yuan. Founded in 2020, the company set a record for the fastest IPO approval on the STAR Market in 2025, clearing in 88 days, and achieved revenue of 780 million yuan in the first three quarters, a year-on-year increase of 182%.

    Muxi Inc., ranked third with a value of 250 billion yuan, is one of China's first high-end GPU companies to achieve full-process localization.

The top ten on the list also include companies such as iFlytek (130 billion yuan), Horizon Robotics (120 billion yuan), Xiyu Jizhi (90 billion yuan), SenseTime (89 billion yuan), VeriSilicon (79 billion yuan), Rockchip (73 billion yuan), and Biren Technology (63 billion yuan). 榜单前十还包括科大讯飞（1300 亿元）、地平线（1200 亿元）、稀宇极智（900 亿元）、商汤科技（890 亿元）、芯原股份（790 亿元）、瑞芯微（730 亿元）以及壁仞科技（630 亿元）等企业。

In terms of enterprise distribution, Beijing ranks first with 19 listed companies, followed by Shanghai (14), Shenzhen (6), and Guangzhou (4), with first-tier cities accounting for over 80%. The average establishment time for listed companies is 12 years, with only iFlytek and TRS being founded before 2000. 从企业分布来看，北京以 19 家上榜企业位居第一，其次为上海（14 家）、深圳（6 家）和广州（4 家），一线城市占比超过 80%。上榜企业平均成立时间为 12 年，仅科大讯飞、拓尔思两家企业成立于 2000 年以前。

Rupert Hoogewerf, Chairman and Chief Researcher of Hurun Report, stated at the press conference that AI is reshaping industrial structure and wealth patterns. 胡润集团董事长兼首席调研官胡润在发布会上表示，AI 正在重塑产业结构与财富格局。

As of last June, China's generative AI user base had reached 515 million, accounting for nearly 40% of the national population. He also pointed out that despite controversies about bubbles in the industry, the trend of technological evolution will not change, and companies with core technologies and implementation capabilities will continue to stand out. 截至去年 6 月，中国生成式 AI 用户规模已达 5.15 亿，占全国人口近四成。他同时指出，尽管行业存在泡沫争议，但技术演进趋势不会改变，具备核心技术与落地能力的企业将持续脱颖而出。

item.title: 逐际动力 LimX Oli 实现全尺寸人形机器人群体自主出舱
item.guid: 逐际动力-LimX-Oli-实现全尺寸人形机器人群体自主出舱
item.description:
Yesterday, LimX Dynamics released its latest update, showcasing the world's first "group autonomous egress" function for full-size humanoid robots. 昨天，逐际动力发布最新动态，展示了全球首例全尺寸人形机器人「群体自主出舱」功能。

In the video, multiple LimX Oli humanoid robots achieved synchronized movements through cluster control technology. From unboxing to stepping out of the box, the robots demonstrated actions such as turning, lifting feet, and shifting center of gravity, with smooth and natural gaits. 在视频中，多台 LimX Oli 人形机器人通过集群控制技术，实现了整齐划一的同步动作。从开箱触发到迈步出箱的全流程中，机器人展现了转身、抬脚、重心转移等动作，且步态流畅自然。

LimX Dynamics stated that LimX Oli, with its intelligent motion planning, effectively avoids collision and stuttering issues during group movements. 逐际动力表示，LimX Oli 凭借智能化的动作规划，有效规避了群体行动中的碰撞与卡顿问题。

This function, based on reinforcement learning and embodied AI technology, aims to redefine "out-of-the-box" experience, making autonomous unboxing a standard feature for humanoid robots and promoting large-scale cluster control as a daily norm. 该功能基于强化学习与具身智能技术，旨在重新定义「开箱即用」，让自主开箱成为人形机器人的产品标配，并推动大规模集群控制成为日常。

item.title: Chrome 浏览器新增支持垂直标签页功能
item.guid: Chrome-浏览器新增支持垂直标签页功能
item.description:
Recently, Google updated Chrome Beta and Canary versions, adding a "vertical tabs" feature. This feature has been widely available in browsers like Edge, Firefox, Arc (Dia), and Vivaldi, but Chrome had long been missing it and is now finally catching up. 近日，Google 为 Chrome Beta 与 Canary 版本带来更新，加入「垂直标签页」功能。这项功能此前已在 Edge、Firefox、Arc（Dia）、Vivaldi 等浏览器中普遍提供，而 Chrome 长期缺席，如今终于开始补齐。

This feature needs to be manually enabled in "Experimental Features" with the following steps: 该功能需在「实验性功能」中手动打开，步骤如下：

    Open Chrome Beta or Chrome Canary;

    Type chrome://flags/ in the address bar;

    Search for "vertical tabs" on the page;

    Select "Enabled";

    Click "Relaunch" at the bottom of the page.

Once enabled, Chrome will move all tabs from the top to the left side. There's a tab search function at the top of the list, while the new tab and tab group management buttons are located at the bottom. 启用后，Chrome 会将所有标签页从顶部移至左侧，列表顶部有标签页搜索功能，新建标签与标签组管理按钮则位于底部。

Users can also shrink the sidebar to only show icons to save space. If you wish to restore the horizontal tab bar, right-click above the vertical tabs area and select "Move tabs to top". 用户还可将侧边栏缩小，仅保留图标以节省空间。若希望恢复水平标签栏，可在垂直选项卡区域上方右键选择「将标签页移至顶部」。

From a user experience perspective, Chrome's vertical tabs feature has reached a "usable" level, but still has obvious shortcomings. For example, in "icon-only" mode, clicking a tab directly closes it instead of switching, and the sidebar does not automatically hide when playing videos full screen on macOS. 从体验来看，Chrome 的垂直标签页功能已达到「可用」水平，但仍存在明显不足。例如在「仅显示图标」的模式下，点击标签会直接关闭而非切换，且在 macOS 全屏播放视频时侧边栏不会自动隐藏。

As this feature is still in its early testing phase, Google expects to continue optimizing it in subsequent versions. 由于该功能仍处于早期测试阶段，Google 预计将在后续版本中继续优化。

item.title: Anthropic 拟融资 250 亿美元，红杉资本首次入局
item.guid: Anthropic-拟融资-250-亿美元，红杉资本首次入局
item.description:
According to the Financial Times, Silicon Valley venture capital firm Sequoia Capital is planning its first major investment in Anthropic, joining the latest funding round led by Singapore's sovereign wealth fund GIC and US investment firm Coatue. 据 《金融时报》 报道，硅谷风投机构红杉资本正计划首次对 Anthropic 进行大额投资，加入由新加坡主权基金 GIC 与美国投资机构 Coatue 主导的最新一轮融资。

The target size for this funding round is over $25 billion, valuing Anthropic at approximately $35 billion, double its $17 billion valuation from last September. 本轮融资目标规模为 250 亿美元以上，对 Anthropic 的估值约为 3500 亿美元，较去年 9 月的 170 亿美元估值实现翻倍。

Sources revealed that both GIC and Coatue plan to invest $1.5 billion, while Microsoft and Nvidia had previously committed up to $15 billion to Anthropic. 知情人士透露，GIC 与 Coatue 均计划出资 15 亿美元，而微软与英伟达此前已承诺向 Anthropic 投入最高 150 亿美元。

In addition to the aforementioned institutions, other investors, including Sequoia Capital, are expected to contribute over $10 billion. This funding round is still under negotiation, and the final size may continue to change, but it is expected to be completed within the next few weeks. 除上述机构外，包括红杉资本在内的其他投资方预计将贡献超过 100 亿美元。本轮融资仍在洽谈中，最终规模可能继续变化，但预计将在未来数周内完成。

This investment is seen as a significant strategic shift for Sequoia Capital in the AI sector. The firm not only holds shares in OpenAI but has also invested in Elon Musk's xAI, whereas traditional VCs typically avoid betting on direct competitors simultaneously. 此次投资被视为红杉资本在 AI 赛道上的重要策略转向。该机构不仅持有 OpenAI 的股份，也投资了马斯克旗下的 xAI，而传统 VC 通常避免同时押注直接竞争对手。

Several industry insiders point out that the immense commercial potential of the AI field is reshaping investment logic, with leading institutions shifting from "betting on a single winner" to "multi-point deployment." 多位业内人士指出，AI 领域的巨大商业潜力正在重塑投资逻辑，头部机构正从「押注单一赢家」转向「多点布局」。

Reports indicate that Anthropic's revenue has grown approximately tenfold in the past year, increasing from an annualized $1 billion to about $10 billion. The company is accelerating its IPO process, with preparations for listing possibly starting as early as this year. 报道显示，Anthropic 的收入在过去一年实现约 10 倍增长，从年化 10 亿美元提升至约 100 亿美元，公司正加速推进 IPO 进程，最快可能在今年启动上市准备。

Sequoia Capital has also recently undergone management changes. Roelof Botha, who had maintained a cautious attitude towards high-valuation startups, was replaced at the end of last year by Pat Grady and Alfred Lin, who took over as co-leaders. 红杉资本内部近期也经历管理层调整。曾对高估值初创公司保持谨慎态度的 Roelof Botha 已于去年底被替换，由 Pat Grady 与 Alfred Lin 接任共同领导。

Sources say the new management team holds a more positive attitude towards the AI sector, believing that the scale of this track has upgraded from "venture capital" to "equity-like investment" level. 知情人士称，新管理层对 AI 领域持更积极态度，认为该赛道的规模已从「风险投资」升级为「类股票投资」级别。

item.title: 中国儒意投资 1420 万美元押注爱诗科技，加码「AI + 内容」布局
item.guid: 中国儒意投资-1420-万美元押注爱诗科技，加码「AI-+-内容」布局
item.description:
According to reports from Jiemian News, National Business Daily, and Cailian Press, Hong Kong-listed company China Ruyi recently announced a strategic investment of $14.2 million in global AI video enterprise Aishi Technology, establishing a deep strategic partnership with it. 据界面新闻、每日经济新闻及财联社报道，港股上市公司中国儒意近日宣布以 1420 万美元战略投资全球 AI 视频企业爱诗科技，并与其建立深度战略合作伙伴关系。

This collaboration will focus on three major business segments: film and television, streaming media, and gaming, to promote the industrialization of "AI + content" and jointly develop multimodal intelligent agents. 此次合作将围绕影视、流媒体及游戏三大业务板块，推动「AI + 内容」的产业化落地，并共同研发多模态智能体（Agent）。

China Ruyi stated that Aishi Technology will receive authorization for its high-quality copyrighted content, and both parties will collaboratively explore various aspects such as visual design, visual effects production, promotional material generation, content asset optimization, and user experience enhancement. 中国儒意表示，爱诗科技将获得其旗下优质版权内容授权，双方将在视觉设计、视效制作、宣传素材生成、内容资产优化、用户体验提升等环节展开协同探索。

Aishi Technology will also provide strategic consulting services for AI technology implementation to China Ruyi, helping to improve its content production efficiency and quality. 爱诗科技亦将为中国儒意提供 AI 技术落地的战略顾问服务，助力其内容生产效率与品质提升。

Public information shows that Aishi Technology was founded in 2023, focusing on the research and development of large AI video generation models. Its product, PixVerse (Paiwo AI), has accumulated over 100 million global users. 公开信息显示，爱诗科技成立于 2023 年，专注于 AI 视频生成大模型研发，旗下产品 PixVerse（拍我 AI）全球用户规模已突破 1 亿。

The company's recently launched PixVerse R1 is the world's first universal real-time world model supporting 1080P, achieving breakthroughs in generation duration and real-time interaction capabilities. 公司近期推出的 PixVerse R1 为全球首个支持 1080P 的通用实时世界模型，在生成时长与实时交互能力上实现突破。

China Ruyi has continuously expanded its content and technology layout in recent years, successively acquiring controlling stakes in Wanda Film, Youai Huyu (under ByteDance), Yonghang Technology (under Tencent), and Wanda Kuaiqian Finance, among other assets. This investment is seen as a further commitment to the "AI + Content" sector. 中国儒意近年来持续扩张内容与科技布局，先后控股万达电影、收购字节跳动旗下有爱互娱、腾讯旗下永航科技及万达快钱金融等资产。此次投资被视为其在「AI + 内容」赛道的进一步加码。

Cailian Press reported that China Ruyi's investment was completed by its wholly-owned subsidiary, Virtual Cinema Entertainment Limited, with a transaction amount of approximately RMB 98.96 million. 财联社报道指出，中国儒意本次投资由其全资附属公司 Virtual Cinema Entertainment Limited 完成，交易金额约合人民币 9896 万元。

Both parties have signed a strategic cooperation framework agreement, and in the future, they will promote the deep application of AI technology in scenarios such as film and television production, streaming content operations, and game development. 双方已签署战略合作框架协议，未来将在影视制作、流媒体内容运营、游戏研发等场景推进 AI 技术深度应用。

item.title: 💡 Shopify CEO：别把创业者「放进创始人托儿所」
item.guid: 💡-Shopify-CEO：别把创业者「放进创始人托儿所」
item.description:
According to Business Insider, Shopify CEO Tobi Lütke recently stated on the podcast "Founder's Podcast" that many companies often underestimate the value of entrepreneurs' experience after acquisitions, marginalizing them, and even describing this practice as putting founders "into a founder's daycare." 据《商业内幕》报道 ，Shopify CEO Tobi Lütke 近日在播客节目《Founder‘s Podcast》中表示，许多公司在收购后往往低估创业者的经验价值，将他们边缘化，甚至形容这种做法像是把创始人「放进创始人托儿所」。

Lütke pointed out that entrepreneurs typically possess unique ways of thinking and problem-solving abilities, but many companies will place them on the organizational periphery or assign them to so-called "skunk work teams." Lütke 指出，创业者通常具备独特的思维方式与解决问题的能力，但不少企业会将他们安排到组织边缘，或分配到所谓的「skunk work team」（秘密工作小组）。

He stated bluntly that this practice is "isolating the people most capable of identifying problems," emphasizing, "You can't put them in a founder's daycare." 他直言，这种做法是在「把最能指出问题的人隔离起来」，并强调「你不能把他们放进创始人托儿所」。

He mentioned that this situation occurred during Shopify's acquisition integrations amidst the pandemic. After realizing the problem, he proactively increased the presence of acquired company founders within the organization, even giving them higher influence in the management hierarchy. 他提到，这种情况在 Shopify 于疫情期间的收购整合中曾出现。意识到问题后，他主动提升被收购公司创始人在组织内的存在感，甚至让他们在管理层级中拥有更高的影响力。

He also revealed that he maintains a Slack channel with these founders for discussing product and business issues. 他还透露，自己与这些创始人保持一个 Slack 频道，用于交流产品与业务问题。

Shopify's recent acquisitions include the logistics company Deliverr in 2022, the influencer marketing platform Dovetale in the same year, and the enterprise communication platform Threads in 2024. Shopify 近年来的收购包括 2022 年的物流公司 Deliverr、同年的网红营销平台 Dovetale，以及 2024 年的企业沟通平台 Threads。

The report noted that the founders of Dovetale and Threads currently still hold product-related roles at Shopify, while Deliverr's CEO left after one year to re-establish a logistics startup. 报道指出，Dovetale 与 Threads 的创始人目前仍在 Shopify 担任产品相关角色，而 Deliverr 的 CEO 则在加入一年后离开，重新创办物流创业公司。

During the show, Lütke also mentioned that when recruiting, he specifically asks candidates, "Have you ever founded a company?" because this helps him assess their adaptability and execution in crisis situations. 在节目中，Lütke 还提到，他在招聘时会特别询问候选人「你是否创办过公司」，因为这能帮助他判断对方在危机情境中的适应能力与执行力。

item.title: 4999 元起，荣耀 Magic8 Pro Air 正式发布
item.guid: 4999-元起，荣耀-Magic8-Pro-Air-正式发布
item.description:
Yesterday, Honor held a new product launch event in Zhuhai, officially unveiling two new phones: the Honor Magic8 Pro Air and the Honor Magic8 RSR Porsche Design. The Magic8 Pro Air focuses on thinness and versatile imaging, while the Magic8 RSR Porsche Design is positioned as a high-end flagship with supercar-level design and top-tier performance. 昨天，荣耀在珠海举行新品发布会，正式推出荣耀 Magic8 Pro Air 与荣耀 Magic8 RSR 保时捷设计两款新机。其中，Magic8 Pro Air 主打轻薄与全能影像，而 Magic8 RSR 保时捷设计则以超跑级设计与顶级性能定位高端旗舰。

Honor Magic8 Pro Air: 荣耀 Magic8 Pro Air：

    6.1mm thickness and 155g weight;

    Equipped with MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chip, paired with LPDDR5X and UFS 4.1;

    Features a 6.31-inch 1.5K 120Hz flat screen, with a peak brightness of 6000 nits, supporting 4320Hz high-frequency PWM dimming;

    Built-in 5500mAh battery, supporting 80W wired and 50W wireless fast charging;

    Equipped with a 50-megapixel main camera, a 50-megapixel ultra-wide-angle, and a 64-megapixel periscope telephoto lens, supporting 3.2x optical zoom and 100x digital zoom, and debuting the Android camp's first AI zoom array flash.

    Available in four colors: Light Orange, Fairy Purple, Feather White, and Shadow Black, supporting IP68 & IP69 dust and water resistance.

It is worth noting that, according to self-media tests, the Honor Magic8 Pro Air supports "quad-card dual-standby" functionality, including eSIM, and can support international eSIM. 值得注意的是，据自媒体实测，荣耀 Magic8 Pro Air 支持含 eSIM 在内的「四卡双待」功能，并可支持国际 eSIM。

In terms of pricing, the Magic8 Pro Air starts at 4999 yuan (12GB + 256GB), with the top-end 16GB + 1TB version priced at 5999 yuan. 售价方面，Magic8 Pro Air 起售价 4999 元（12GB + 256GB），顶配版 16GB + 1TB 售价 5999 元。

Honor Magic8 RSR Porsche Design: 荣耀 Magic8 RSR 保时捷设计：

    Equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Ultimate Edition chip, with up to 24GB RAM and 1TB storage;

    Built-in 7200mAh battery, supporting 120W wired and 80W wireless fast charging;

    The back cover uses ultra-microcrystalline nano-ceramic material, with a Mohs hardness of 8.5, available in Moonstone and Slate Gray color options.

    Equipped with a 200-megapixel Super Night Vision telephoto lens and a 50-megapixel main camera, supporting CIPA 6.5-level image stabilization and more accurate original color reproduction; an optional professional imaging kit is available, including a 200mm teleconverter, filter adapter ring, and magnetic grip.

In terms of pricing, the Honor Magic8 RSR 16GB + 512GB version starts at 7999 yuan, and the 24GB + 1TB version is 8999 yuan. Both new phones will officially go on sale simultaneously on January 23rd at 10:08. 售价方面，荣耀 Magic8 RSR 16GB + 512GB 版本起售价 7999 元，24GB + 1TB 版本 8999 元，两款新机将同步于 1 月 23 日 10:08 正式开售。

item.title: 海信发布 RGB‑Mini LED 旗舰电视 E8S
item.guid: 海信发布-RGB‑Mini-LED-旗舰电视-E8S
item.description:
Yesterday, Hisense held the "Hisense RGB-Mini LED Upgrade Storm" press conference, officially launching the E8S series of flagship gaming and home theater TVs. 昨天，海信举行「海信 RGB‑Mini LED 换代风暴」发布会，正式推出影游旗舰电视 E8S 系列。

As the pioneer of RGB-Mini LED technology, Hisense emphasized at the conference that color backlighting will become the mainstream of next-generation display technology, and is promoting the popularization of RGB-Mini LED with generational advantages and a competitive pricing strategy. 作为 RGB‑Mini LED 技术的开创者，海信在会上强调彩色背光将成为下一代显示技术主流，并以代际优势与同档定价策略推动 RGB‑Mini LED 普及。

Hisense pointed out that the current high-end TV market is still dominated by monochrome backlight quantum dot Mini LED, but this solution relies on blue light and quantum dot film for color conversion, resulting in high energy loss and easy whitewashing in bright areas. RGB-Mini LED achieves direct light output through independent R/G/B three-color light-emitting chips, creating generational differences in energy efficiency, color purity, and brightness performance. 海信指出，当前高端电视市场仍以单色背光量子点 Mini LED 为主，但该方案依赖蓝光与量子点膜进行色彩转换，能量损耗高、亮场易泛白。RGB‑Mini LED 通过 R/G/B 三色独立发光芯片实现光源直出，可在能效、色彩纯度与亮度表现上形成代际差异。

In terms of picture quality, light control, and gaming performance, the core parameters of the E8S include: 在画质、控光与游戏性能方面，E8S 的核心参数包括：

    100% BT.2020 color gamut, with color reproduction improved by 20%+ compared to monochrome backlight quantum dot Mini LED;

    40%+ energy saving, hardware-level reduction of 42% harmful blue light;

    RISC-V-based Xinxin H7 chip, supporting 3D light and color co-control, up to 9360 local dimming zones, 108 bits color control accuracy, and color accuracy ΔE<1;

    Obsidian Screen Pro (1.8% reflectivity), XDR Pro 5300 nits peak brightness, Dolby Vision Gen2;

    Devialet 4.2.2 acoustic system, 270W power, 7.6L sound cavity, low frequency down to 45Hz;

    Native 4K 180Hz, up to 330Hz refresh rate, minimum latency of 4.7ms, four HDMI 2.1 ports.

Regarding pricing, Hisense has brought RGB-Mini LED to the same level as monochrome backlight quantum dot Mini LED: 75 inches for 12999 yuan, 85 inches for 17999 yuan, and 100 inches for 24999 yuan. 价格方面，海信将 RGB‑Mini LED 拉至与单色背光量子点 Mini LED 同档：75 吋 12999 元、85 吋 17999 元、100 吋 24999 元。

item.title: 阶跃 AI 桌面伙伴上线 Windows 版，跨应用操作能力升级
item.guid: 阶跃-AI-桌面伙伴上线-Windows-版，跨应用操作能力升级
item.description:
Yesterday, Jeyee Star announced the official launch of the Windows version of its desktop intelligent agent product, "Jeyee AI Desktop Partner," along with several significant upgrades. The Mac version of this product was launched in September last year. 昨天，阶跃星辰宣布其桌面智能体产品「阶跃 AI 桌面伙伴」正式推出 Windows 版本，并同步带来多项重要升级。该产品此前已在去年 9 月上线 Mac 版本。

Jeyee stated that its goal is to create a terminal Agent that "gets things done, is always present, has memory, and can evolve," helping users improve their work and life efficiency. 阶跃表示，其目标是打造「会做事、总在场、有记忆、能进化」的终端 Agent，帮助用户提升工作与生活效率。

Following the launch of the Mac version, the team received extensive feedback and requests for cross-application operations, automated execution, and system-level perception capabilities, with the Windows version being the most highly anticipated. Mac 版推出后，团队收到大量关于跨应用操作、自动化执行以及系统级感知能力的反馈与催更，其中呼声最高的即为 Windows 版本。

Key features of Jeyee AI Desktop Partner include: 阶跃 AI 桌面伙伴的核心功能包括：

    Support for calling third-party tools (MCP) Xiaoyue now supports calling 16 tools such as Excel, QQ Mail, Feishu, DingTalk, Notion, and Amap via MCP. Users can also extend more MCP tools themselves. Official examples include automatically sending personalized emails, capturing and analyzing event data, emphasizing its ability to execute complex tasks across applications.

    Global Memory Function (Mac only currently) Xiaoyue can automatically record user activity on the computer and generate daily review reports, forming a traceable personal work memory layer. Jeyee emphasizes that all relevant data is stored on the local device to ensure privacy and security.

    Synchronized Application Capability (Mac only currently) After the user clicks the floating ball, Xiaoyue can automatically identify the current window content and use it as context input, reducing copy-pasting steps and achieving a "what you see is what you ask" interaction method.

item.title: 姜超回应红魔 11 Air 涨价：核心元件暴涨，整个行业都面临困境
item.guid: 姜超回应红魔-11-Air-涨价：核心元件暴涨，整个行业都面临困境
item.description:
Yesterday, Jiang Chao, General Manager of Red Magic Gaming Phone Products, posted on Weibo to respond to external concerns about the pricing of the new Red Magic 11 Air. 昨天，红魔游戏手机产品总经理姜超在微博发文，回应外界对红魔 11 Air 新品定价的关注。

He stated that the continuous rise in prices of core components this year, coupled with multiple hardware upgrades, has made the overall cost pressure "truly impossible to fully absorb," and that price increases have become a widespread trend faced by the industry. 他表示，今年核心元器件价格持续上涨，叠加多项硬件升级，使得整体成本压力「确实没办法完全消化」，并称涨价已成为行业普遍面临的趋势。

Jiang Chao pointed out that the surge in storage chip prices is one of the main sources of pressure. Additionally, the Red Magic 11 Air adopts a flagship full screen, larger capacity battery, all-transparent body, and a new cooling fan, among other configurations, each significantly driving up material costs. 姜超指出，存储芯片价格暴涨是主要压力来源之一，同时红魔 11 Air 采用旗舰级全面屏、更大容量电池、全系透明机身以及全新散热风扇等配置，每一项都显著推高了物料成本。

He emphasized that the team underwent repeated deliberations on pricing, but ultimately still had to face the real changes in costs. 他强调，团队在定价上经历反复权衡，但最终仍需面对成本端的现实变化。

The Red Magic 11 Air will be officially released today, and the reported specifications are summarized as follows: 红魔 11 Air 将于今天正式发布，具体配置相关报料总结如下：

    Equipped with Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition, self-developed e-sports chip Red Core R4, LPDDR5X ULTRA, and UFS4.1;

    Exclusively built-in PC emulator, compatible with multiple AAA games such as "Tomb Raider 9," "Assassin's Creed: Rogue," and "Need for Speed 17";

    Features a 6.85-inch AMOLED display with a screen-to-body ratio of 95.1%, bezels as narrow as 1.25mm, supporting 144Hz refresh rate, 2592Hz high-frequency PWM dimming, and DC dimming;

    Equipped with "Yufeng 4.0" active cooling fan, and adopts aerospace aluminum air-cooled bracket, ice-stage VC, under-screen graphene copper foil and other structures.

item.title: 字节跳动旗下扣子 2.0 正式发布，全球首发 AI Agent 技能商店
item.guid: 字节跳动旗下扣子-2.0-正式发布，全球首发-AI-Agent-技能商店
item.description:
Yesterday, ByteDance's intelligent agent platform "Coze" released a major 2.0 version upgrade and simultaneously launched the world's first AI skill store (Coze Skills) for general users. 昨天，字节跳动旗下智能体平台「扣子（Coze）」发布 2.0 版本重大升级，并同步推出全球首个面向普通用户的 AI 技能商店（Coze Skills）。

This update revolves around four major capabilities: "Agent Skills," "Agent Plan," "Agent Office," and "Agent Coding," aiming to evolve AI from a passive answering tool into a long-term collaborative workplace partner. 此次更新围绕「Agent Skills」「Agent Plan」「Agent Office」「Agent Coding」四大能力展开，旨在让 AI 从被动回答工具，进一步进化为可长期协作的职场伙伴。

    Agent Skills : Encapsulates reusable work experience into standardized skill packages that can be called by intelligent agents at any time;

    Agent Plan : Automatically break down steps based on user goals and continuously execute and advance long-term tasks;

    Agent Office : Automatically handle daily tasks such as document processing, spreadsheets, and information organization in office scenarios;

    Agent Coding : Provides one-stop agent development and operation and maintenance capabilities from build to deployment.

Kouzi stated that the goal of version 2.0 is to enable AI not just to "help you do," but to "do it for you completely." With the integration of skills, long-term tasks, and development platforms, Kouzi hopes to promote AI to undertake more execution and analysis work in workplace scenarios, allowing users to focus their energy on strategy and creativity. 扣子方面称，2.0 版本的目标是让 AI 不仅能「帮你做」，更能「替你做完」。随着技能、长期任务与开发平台的整合，扣子希望推动 AI 在职场场景中承担更多执行与分析工作，让用户将精力集中在策略与创造上。

item.title: 飞书 x 安克推出「AI 豆」，轻至 10g 想做你的「第二大脑」
item.guid: 飞书-x-安克推出「AI-豆」，轻至-10g-想做你的「第二大脑」
item.description:
Yesterday, Anker Innovations and Feishu jointly launched a new AI recording hardware, the "AI Recording Bean," featuring extreme lightweight design and deep software collaboration, positioned as a wearable "second brain." 昨天，安克创新与飞书联合推出全新 AI 录音硬件「AI 录音豆」，主打极轻量化与深度软件协同，定位为可随身佩戴的「第二大脑」。

This single recording bean weighs only 10 grams, has a diameter of 23.2mm, is about the size of a coin, and can be worn on a collar, cuff, or work badge like a brooch or accessory. Anker's lightweight hardware engineering design makes it almost imperceptible during daily use; 这颗录音豆单体重量仅 10 克，直径 23.2mm，大小接近一枚硬币，可像胸针或饰品一样佩戴在领口、袖口或工牌上。安克在硬件工程上的轻量化设计，使其在日常使用中几乎无感；

Feishu provides AI capabilities such as real-time transcription, structured summaries, smart whiteboards, and knowledge base accumulation, transforming recordings from "files" into collaborative and searchable knowledge assets. 飞书则提供实时转写、结构化总结、智能画板、知识库沉淀等 AI 能力，让录音从「文件」变成可协作、可检索的知识资产。

In practical experience, the recording bean can generate logically clear summaries in real-time during meetings, press conferences, interviews, and other scenarios, including structured content such as fishbone diagrams, timelines, key decisions, and to-do items. 在实际体验中，录音豆可在会议、发布会、访谈等场景中实时生成逻辑清晰的总结，包括鱼骨图、时间线、关键决策、待办事项等结构化内容。

In cross-language scenarios, the recording bean supports real-time translation for 24 languages and can distinguish different speakers. When facing high-density information input scenarios like English press conferences, the system can dynamically adjust translation strategies based on context, reducing the common "machine translation fragmentation." 在跨语言场景中，录音豆支持 24 种语言实时翻译，并可区分不同说话人。面对英文发布会等高密度信息输入场景，系统能根据上下文动态调整翻译策略，减少常见的「机翻割裂感」。

After recording, all content is automatically deposited into the Feishu knowledge base, integrating with the user's documents, chat records, calendar, and other information. Users can ask questions based on the entire knowledge base, rather than being limited to a single recording file. 录音结束后，所有内容会自动沉淀至飞书知识库，与用户的文档、聊天记录、日历等信息打通。用户可基于整个知识库进行提问，而非仅限于单条录音文件。

Users can export smart meeting minutes as Word or PDF, or directly edit, comment, and highlight with team members in Feishu. 用户可将智能纪要导出为 Word 或 PDF，或直接在飞书中与团队成员共同编辑、评论与划线。

Anker and Feishu stated that this product provides an efficient interface connecting the physical world with digital knowledge bases, making information recording lighter and knowledge accumulation more natural. 安克与飞书表示，这款产品提供了一个连接物理世界与数字知识库的高效接口，让信息记录更轻量、知识沉淀更自然。

item.title: 京东京造推出第二批 AI 玩具，覆盖全年龄段用户
item.guid: 京东京造推出第二批-AI-玩具，覆盖全年龄段用户
item.description:
Jingdong Jingzao's second batch of self-developed AI toys launched this year, with the product line covering all age groups for the first time, offering corresponding models for infants, children, young adults, and seniors, forming a more complete AI companionship ecosystem. 京东京造今年推出的第二批自研 AI 玩具正式上线，产品线首次覆盖全年龄段用户，从婴幼儿、儿童到年轻人及老年人均有对应型号，形成更完整的 AI 陪伴生态。

    The "Laolao Parrot" for seniors supports dialect communication, has built-in content like traditional opera and storytelling, and features emergency calls, integration with JD Health, and synchronization of children's logs;

    The "Qiouqiu and Momo" for young adults focuses on emotional companionship, capable of receiving users' daily complaints and providing emotional organization and support;

    The "Pet Smart Dog · Dongdong" for children can tell stories, answer questions, supports voice and remote control interaction, and its LCD screen displays real-time expressions to enhance the immersive companionship experience.

JD emphasizes that, relying on years of accumulated resources, it can complete the full-link process from product definition and technical docking to market promotion within 30 days, ensuring stable supply and cost-effectiveness of new products. 京东强调，依托多年积累的资源，实现 30 天内完成产品定义、技术对接到上市推广的全链路流程，确保新品稳定供应与质价比表现。

At the content level, AI toys can access resources from JD Health, JD Books, and other platforms, covering scenarios such as health, entertainment, and education, making long-term use more aligned with real needs. 在内容层面，AI 玩具可调用京东健康、京东图书等资源，覆盖健康、娱乐、教育等场景，使长期使用更贴近真实需求。

The JoyInside system provides hardware with "long-term memory" and "situational awareness" capabilities, enabling it to recognize infant cries, offer enlightenment guidance to children, engage in deep conversations with young adults, and accompany seniors with dialects while also addressing their health and social needs. JoyInside 系统为硬件提供「长期记忆」与「情境感知」能力，可识别婴幼儿哭声、为儿童提供启蒙引导、与年轻人进行深度聊天，并以方言陪伴老年人，同时关注其健康与社交需求。

Multimodal learning capabilities combined with integrated hardware and software design enable products to present a more natural, anthropomorphic experience. 多模态学习能力结合软硬件一体化设计，使产品呈现更自然的拟人化体验。

Currently, JD's self-developed AI toy series is being sold on the JD platform, covering family scenarios such as children's enlightenment, emotional companionship, and elder care. 目前，京东自研 AI 玩具系列已在京东平台销售，覆盖儿童启蒙、情绪陪伴、长者关怀等家庭场景。

item.title: 小红书上线《社区公约 2.0》：强化反对对立与虚假内容治理
item.guid: 小红书上线《社区公约-2.0》：强化反对对立与虚假内容治理
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaohongshu officially launched "Community Convention 2.0", proposing clearer advocacy directions for community content, interactive behavior, and commercial operations, and for the first time merging the original community convention with the commercial convention to form a complete regulatory system covering content, interaction, and operations. 昨天，小红书正式上线《社区公约 2.0》，对社区内容、互动行为及商业经营提出更明确的倡导方向，并首次将原有社区公约与商业公约合并，形成覆盖内容、互动与经营的完整规范体系。

The new convention includes three major sections: "Sincere Sharing," "Friendly Interaction," and "Orderly Operation," with 25 advocacies, focusing on opposing the creation of conflict, resisting false content, protecting minors, and regulating commercial behavior. 新版公约共包含「真诚分享」「友好互动」「有序经营」三大板块、25 条倡导，重点强调反对制造对立、抵制虚假内容、保护未成年人以及规范商业行为等议题。

Lego, head of Xiaohongshu's community governance, stated that Convention 2.0 reflects the platform's governance direction in addressing "new ecological challenges" during different development cycles, providing clearer behavioral guidelines for users and maintaining the community atmosphere through value consensus. 小红书社区治理负责人莱戈表示，公约 2.0 体现了平台在不同发展周期中面对「生态新课题」的治理方向，为用户提供更清晰的行为指引，并通过价值观共识维护社区氛围。

Regarding "opposing the creation of conflict," the convention adds three new detailed rules, including "Please respect different genders, regions, races, occupations, and interests" and "Please do not easily use your influence to make accusations or publish inflammatory remarks," emphasizing that the platform does not oppose normal interaction of views, but opposes behaviors that deliberately amplify group differences and use confrontational topics to attract traffic. 在「反对制造对立」方面，公约新增三条细则，包括「请尊重不同的性别、地域、种族、职业和兴趣」及「请不要轻易利用你的影响力进行指控或发布煽动性的话语」等，强调平台不反对正常观点交互，但反对刻意放大群体差异、利用对立话题吸引流量的行为。

According to data disclosed by Xiaohongshu, from January 1, 2025, to date, the platform has dealt with 534,200 accounts and 4.598 million notes involved in creating conflict, with an average of over 8 million related comments processed monthly. 根据小红书披露的数据，自 2025 年 1 月 1 日至今，平台已处置涉及制造对立的账号 53.42 万个、笔记 459.8 万篇，月均处置相关评论超 800 万条。

Regarding content authenticity, the convention proposes rejecting false personas, avoiding exaggerated and sensational content, and requiring users who use AI-assisted creation to actively label it; regarding minor protection, it clearly advocates "not initiating or participating in any form of cyber violence." 在内容真实性方面，公约提出拒绝虚假人设、避免夸张猎奇内容，并要求使用 AI 辅助创作的用户主动标注；在未成年人保护方面，明确倡导「不发起、不参与任何形式的网络暴力」。

In terms of commercial governance, "Community Convention 2.0" adds an "Orderly Operation" section, requiring operators to disclose their identity and provide true information, and opposing behaviors such as illegal marketing, malicious competition, fabricating reputation, and posing as ordinary users. 商业治理方面，《社区公约 2.0》新增「有序经营」板块，要求经营者亮明身份、提供真实信息，反对违规营销、恶意竞争、伪造口碑及伪装素人等行为。

Xiaohongshu stated that in the future, it will continue to invest resources to enhance its governance capabilities for creating conflict and false content through special governance and optimization of recommendation algorithms, and further improve the standardization of its commercial ecosystem. 小红书表示，未来将持续投入资源，通过专项治理与推荐算法优化，提升对制造对立及虚假内容的治理能力，并进一步完善商业生态的规范化建设。

item.title: 曹操出行上线遗留物自动报失功能
item.guid: 曹操出行上线遗留物自动报失功能
item.description:
Recently, Caocao Mobility piloted the "Lost Item" automatic reporting function nationwide, using a large visual model to identify high-value items left in the car and proactively triggering reminders before passengers even realize they've lost something, further improving the intelligent service system in the Robotaxi era. 近日，曹操出行在全国范围内试点上线「落东西」自动报失功能，利用视觉大模型识别车内高价值遗留物，并在乘客尚未察觉遗失前主动触发提醒，进一步完善 Robotaxi 时代的智能化服务体系。

Caocao Mobility stated that over 1,300 customized vehicles nationwide have been put into the pilot program for this function. The vehicles use in-cabin dual cameras and a large visual model to monitor the interior environment in real-time, automatically identifying common high-value items such as mobile phones, laptops, and backpacks. After passengers alight, the lost item reporting process is automatically triggered, notifying passengers immediately and assisting in retrieval. 曹操出行表示，全国已有超 1300 辆定制车投入该功能试点，车辆通过舱内双摄与视觉大模型实时巡查车内环境，可自动识别手机、电脑、背包等常见高价值物品，并在乘客下车后自动触发报失流程，第一时间通知乘客并协助找回。

Caocao Mobility emphasized that the automatic lost item identification function not only improves the current ride-hailing service efficiency but will also become one of its important capabilities in the Robotaxi 2.0 phase. 曹操出行强调，遗留物自动识别功能不仅提升当前网约车服务效率，也将成为其 Robotaxi 2.0 阶段的重要能力之一。

The company is promoting the transition from "main driver safety officer" to "unmanned operation," deeply integrating intelligent cockpits, intelligent driving, and intelligent operations to build an automated service system for the Robotaxi era, achieving more proactive safety protection and service experience upgrades. 公司正推动从「主驾安全员」向「无人化运营」过渡，将智能座舱、智能驾驶与智能运营深度融合，构建 Robotaxi 时代的自动化服务体系，实现更主动的安全守护与服务体验升级。

Caocao Mobility stated that in the future, it will continue to refine relevant capabilities in real travel scenarios, improve the collaborative performance of intelligent customized vehicles, intelligent driving technology, and intelligent operations, and further enhance the service level of Robotaxi. 曹操出行表示，未来将继续在真实出行场景中打磨相关能力，完善智能定制车、智能驾驶技术与智能运营的协同表现，进一步提升 Robotaxi 的服务水平。

item.title: 为澳网备战，lululemon 推出全新 Ventilated 网球系列
item.guid: 为澳网备战，lululemon-推出全新-Ventilated-网球系列
item.description:
lululemon recently unveiled the 2026 Australian Open kit created for professional tennis player and brand ambassador Frances Tiafoe. The collection features new colorways to honor his family's homeland, Sierra Leone, and has been simultaneously launched for consumers. lululemon 近日公布其为职业网球运动员、品牌大使 Frances Tiafoe 打造的 2026 年澳大利亚网球公开赛战袍。该系列以全新配色致敬其家族故乡塞拉利昂，并已同步面向消费者上新。

Tiafoe will make his appearance at Melbourne Park wearing the Ventilated tennis collection gear co-designed by him and lululemon. The overall design features a spray-paint style visual language, inspired by the energy and speed of a tennis shot, with main colors of blue, green, and white, echoing the colors of the Sierra Leone flag. Tiafoe 此次将在墨尔本公园亮相，身着由他与 lululemon 共同设计的 Ventilated 网球系列装备。整体采用喷绘风格视觉语言，灵感来自网球击球瞬间的能量与速度，主色调为蓝色、绿色与白色，呼应塞拉利昂国旗配色。

Tiafoe stated that being able to pay tribute to the country that shaped his upbringing in this way is "meaningful" and hopes that this gear will inspire more people following his journey to pursue possibilities. Tiafoe 表示，能够以这种方式向塑造其成长背景的国家致敬「意义非凡」，并希望这套装备能激励更多关注其征程的人追逐可能性。

lululemon and Tiafoe have a long-standing collaboration, jointly creating professional gear that combines athletic performance and style expression through product research and development and testing. This new men's collection includes short-sleeve casual shirts, athletic vests, and shorts. The tops feature four-way stretch fabric with ventilation structures, while the shorts have quick-drying, wicking properties and a lightweight liner, aiming to enhance comfort and flexibility during matches. lululemon 与 Tiafoe 长期合作，通过产品研发与测试共同打造兼具运动表现与风格表达的专业装备。本次上新的男士系列包括短袖休闲衫、运动背心与短裤等，上装采用四面弹力面料并加入通风结构，下装短裤具备速干芯吸性能并配备轻盈内衬，旨在提升比赛中的舒适度与灵活性。

Another lululemon ambassador, professional tennis player Leylah Fernandez, will also wear the Ventilated tennis tank top and high-waisted tennis skirt at the Australian Open. These feature Ultralu fabric and laser-cut perforations to enhance fit and breathability. 另一位 lululemon 大使、职业网球运动员 Leylah Fernandez 也将在澳网赛场穿着 Ventilated 网球通风设计运动背心及高腰网球裙。其采用 Ultralu 面料与激光切割开孔设计，以提升贴合度与透气性。

item.title: 《闪灵》4K 修复版定档 1 月 30 日
item.guid: 《闪灵》4K-修复版定档-1-月-30-日
item.description:
The classic horror film "The Shining" has officially announced that it will land in mainland cinemas on January 30, and will be screened for the first time on the domestic big screen in a 4K restored version, offering IMAX, CINITY, and regular 2D formats. 经典惊悚电影《闪灵》已正式宣布将于 1 月 30 日登陆内地影院，并以 4K 修复版形式首次在国内大银幕放映，提供 IMAX、CINITY 与普通 2D 三种制式。

"The Shining" is adapted from Stephen King's novel of the same name, produced by Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. of the United States, and is hailed as a "textbook for horror films." The film creates a unique psychological thriller atmosphere with its advanced audio-visual language, symmetrical composition, long takes, and highly oppressive soundtrack. 《闪灵》改编自斯蒂芬 · 金同名小说，由美国华纳兄弟娱乐公司出品，被誉为「恐怖片教科书」。影片以其超前的视听语言、对称构图、长镜头运用及极具压迫感的配乐，构建出独特的心理惊悚氛围。

item.title: 《镖人》发布首支预告，定档春节
item.guid: 《镖人》发布首支预告，定档春节
item.description:
The wuxia action film "Dao Ma: Wind Rises in the Desert" released its first trailer and release date poster yesterday, scheduled for this year's Spring Festival. The film is directed by Yuen Woo-ping and produced by Wu Jing and Yu Baimei. 武侠动作电影《镖人：风起大漠》昨日释出首支预告与定档海报，定档今年春节。影片由袁和平执导，吴京、俞白眉监制。

The film is adapted from Xu Xianzhe's comic of the same name, "Dao Ma." The story revolves around Dao Ma escorting "Heavenly Rank No. 1 Fugitive" Zhi Shilang to Chang'an. As multiple forces intervene, the escort journey affects the world's situation, forming a wuxia narrative main line spanning from the Western Regions to Chang'an. 影片改编自许先哲同名漫画《镖人》，故事围绕刀马护送「天字号第一逃犯」知世郎前往长安展开。随着多方势力介入，押镖之旅牵动天下局势，形成贯穿西域至长安的武侠叙事主线。

item.title: 《疯狂动物城 2》登顶好莱坞动画票房冠军 全球突破 17 亿美元
item.guid: 《疯狂动物城-2》登顶好莱坞动画票房冠军-全球突破-17-亿美元
item.description:
"Zootopia 2" has broken multiple box office records in the global market, officially becoming the highest-grossing animated film in Hollywood history. 《疯狂动物城 2》已在全球市场刷新多项票房纪录，正式成为好莱坞影史票房最高的动画电影。

According to the latest data released by Disney, "Zootopia 2" has accumulated a global box office of $1.703 billion, with North America contributing $390 million and the international market achieving $1.313 billion. 迪士尼公布的最新数据显示，《疯狂动物城 2》全球累计票房达到 17.03 亿美元，其中北美贡献 3.90 亿美元，国际市场取得 13.13 亿美元。

This achievement allows it to surpass "Inside Out 2," released last year, to top the Hollywood animated film box office chart, and rank 9th in global box office history. 这一成绩使其超越去年上映的《头脑特工队 2》，登顶好莱坞动画电影票房榜首，并跻身全球影史票房第 9 位。

The film continues the main storyline of its predecessor, with Ginnifer Goodwin and Jason Bateman reprising their roles as the rabbit and fox duo, and a new character voiced by Ke Huy Quan. Yesterday, Disney announced that the film's theatrical run will be extended until February 25. 影片延续前作主线，由 Ginnifer Goodwin 与 Jason Bateman 再度配音兔子与狐狸搭档，并加入由关继威（Ke Huy Quan）声演的新角色。昨天，迪士尼宣布，本片将延长放映至 2 月 25 日。
